Join us for a magical adventure filled with wonder and mystery. Book your journey now and be part of the enchantment in ‘Fairytale,’ where each moment is a page in your own mystical story.

name: The Godfather
description: You are a member of the Corleone mafia family – one of the most powerful families in the Big Apple until now. Dark times have come to the Corleone family, and you need a way out before they take you out with the trash. You and your mafia members need a backup plan so you decide to work for the new and prosperous Tattaglia mafia family. To deserve their trust, you must complete a dangerous task – steal the Corleone’s diary. You have 60 minutes before anyone finds out. Will you make it out alive? Or will you be sleeping with the fishes?

name: Unforgettable adventures
description: Prepare to be amazed!
location: Our VIP room is clean, private space for your crew to hang out.

name: Nyctophobia: Fear of the dark
description: The current housing shortage in the city has made you consider a house in the country. Your real estate agent takes you to see the perfect bargain property – an abandoned home that’s been left in excellent condition. In fact, it’s almost like the original residents never left… Are you brave enough to take a tour of this house? Can you find all the secrets hidden in the shadows before time runs out? Or do you suffer from Nyctophobia?

name: Hong Kong Afterdark
description: Dragon Head Lee, leader of the Triad, was found lifeless in the secluded back alley of Peace Street, mere hours before the Inheritance Ceremony. The deputy chairmen—FayeTal, Bomber, and MadDog—emerge as prime suspects in this chilling crime. To appease the spirit of the departed and restore order, blood must be spilled, and a new leader must emerge from the chaos. A team of fresh recruits has been assembled by the elders to navigate this treacherous landscape. But beware, in this clandestine underworld, treachery lurks around every corner, and even the closest allies may harbor hidden agendas.

name: Wild West Showdown
description: This is a simple time with two straightforward rules: everything can be bought with enough gold, and don't get shot. It's a barren land where the undertaker is the busiest person in town, and next is the sheriff. There ain't much entertainment around this part of the map; not even the thrill of gunpowder and gambling can quench that thirst for adrenaline. A group of strangers arrives in town by coach—what will await them? Fame and glory, or death and destruction?

name: Virus Outbreak: The Final Hour
description: Dr. Craig was arrested for conducting unethical experimentations on human test subjects. Having circumvented imprisonment, he built a secret laboratory beneath the city's sewage system. In the last moments of his life, the maniac managed to complete and successfully unleash a lethal neurotoxin into the city. Time is running out… the toxin will soon take effect. Your only option is to venture into the sewers, locate the lab and retrieve the serum before it's too late...

name: Once Upon a Time
description: Once upon a time, the Forest Fairy summoned everyone for a grand celebration. Beast or beauty, wicked or charming, all your favourite fairy tale characters have been invited. Gather all the guests to ensure the party is a success. Traveling through the enchanted woods, you’ll encounter everyone from the Princess to Pinocchio! But that’s not all – there are witches and thieves and other villains lurking in the magical forest! Throughout your noble quest, you’ll have to prevent them from sabotaging the party! Are you ready to embark on this adventure?

name: Escape Room Booking
description: Special! Save $6.50 when upgrading with an escape room booking on the same day.
location: Markham Location #7 - 7501 Woodbine Ave Markham, ON L3R 2W1

name: Defend the Magic Academy
description: For centuries, Ilverward’s School for Gifted Young Mages has stood as a grand academy built upon a place of power, attracting new Mages from near and far to learn magic. However, in recent times, evil creatures and dark forces have begun to threaten the academy. The Professors and the Headmaster find themselves on the front lines, defending the Magic Academy even as a new school year begins. As new mages, you will embark on an adventure, mastering lessons along the way to acquire the abilities necessary to aid your academy in reclaiming a powerful relic known as the Stone of Wisdom. Once discovered and properly placed, the Stone of Wisdom will restore the protective force field around the school, securing the future of the academy once and for all.

name: Dark Altar
description: An archeology fanatic is the head of the mysterious and spooky Copenheimer Museum, where he hopes to use a dark ritual to give himself eternal, Godly power. Those who enter the museum must face the dark power and stop the ritual before it’s too late.

name: Z Express
description: The train ride to Geumdo Island was meant to be a routine beginning—a new role with Barrier Corp, a cutting-edge pharmaceutical giant in South Korea. But from the moment you stepped onto the train, something felt wrong. Unsettling noises, missing crew members, and restricted areas are only the beginning. Now, you’re stranded in a facility shrouded in secrets, where every turn brings new dangers. What began as a promising career move has spiralled into a struggle for survival. Can you outsmart the shadows of Geumdo Island and escape with your life, or will its hidden horrors trap you forever?

name: #Hacker, #SciFi, #Infiltration, #BeginnerFriendly, #HighTech
description: In the year 2076, the Frost Corp dominated the world. They had used the "Frost Queen" system to infiltrate every pixel, claiming it was for freedom and protection. However, their unethical sale of personal data has sparked outrage and also rebellion. As a member of the rebellion known as "The Defiance", your mission is to infiltrate the Frost Corp, upload the Defiance virus directly into the root of the Frost Queen, and shut it down once and for all!

name: escape rooms
description: Delight in the opportunity to handcraft delicious beverages, facilitate thrilling activities, and even take on the role of an NPC in our exciting escape rooms.

scarbrough.address: Upper - 1187 Kennedy Rd, Scarborough, ON M1P 2L2

name: Escape Room Adventure
description: An immersive escape room experience where customers step into a Western tale, guided by actors like a rough and sarcastic bartender with an authentic Western accent. The actor must showcase dynamic improv skills to respond to each customer group, creating memorable interactions and enhancing the overall adventure.

name: Escape Games
description: 10 Escape Games | Board Game Cafe

location.address: Upper - 1187 Kennedy Rd, Scarborough, ON M1P 2L2

name: The Red Admiral
description: The cold war has yet to end, as the battle for political and military power heightened tensions between the East and the West. Information is the key to prevailing in the ongoing struggles. You are tasked with collecting data along with your team of top secret spies. Today, you are given an opportunity to end the war. Your cover has allowed you to slip past security; now, the Enemy’s Admiral wishes to meet face to face with your team.

name: The Penitentiary
description: You suddenly wake up to find yourself locked in a cramped prison cell, cold, scared, the air-filled with silence. You soon realize that you are in the St. Temple Prison. This abandoned prison has a history of mysteriously taking the lives of its prisoners. If you don’t want to be next, you have to escape...

name: SINISTER CIRCUS: The Joker's Legacy
description: You open your mailbox to find tickets for the circus that just arrived in town… funny, you don’t remember ordering any. Arriving at the circus, you are greeted by a familiar presence – that mocking voice, that maniacal laughter, it could only be the Joker! He’s back for Round 2 with his brand-new Sinister Circus! Entertain the Joker by solving his riddles, don’t let his mind grow idle or he’ll take his anger out on you! Can you survive a descent into the Joker’s world of madness and murder?

name: Motel Betty
description: The long drive has taken the last ounce of energy out of your group. Your car slowly rolls up to the run-down driveway. If it wasn’t for the large red neon sign that reads Motel Betty, you would have missed it in the thunderstorm. Your group makes your way inside, only to find an empty front desk with a keycard that reads "011." Tired and not wanting to look for somewhere else to spend the night, you grab the keycard and head through the dark corridor. Little do you know, this will be a night filled with horror and insanity.

name: The Kingdom of Cats
description: The Cat King has been Catnapped! He vanished from his room one day and has been missing ever since! The whole royal family is scratching their ears as they search for their beloved King to no avail. You have been invited to a tea party by the Queen, as you are the greatest detectives in the human world. Will you be able to find the King and save the Cat Kingdom from falling into chaos?

name: Project Sphere
description: Dennis Christopher, an award winning Quantum Physicist, has vanished into thin air. He was last known to be working on a revolutionary project. Authorities were unable to find any traces left by this scientist. With no other options, a bounty has been placed for anyone able to find information regarding the situation. Now you, a special investigation unit, have been called to enter his study room in search for clues.

name: Robotcalypse
description: Take a futuristic journey aboard a spaceship! Unfortunately, it’s not all smooth sailing. Forced to make an emergency landing, you and your crew find yourselves on a distant planet populated entirely by robots! All you want is to repair your spaceship and be on your way, but that won’t be easy so long as the evil robot Zybar rules. Can you restore peace and prosperity for the robots? Or will you be stranded in space?

name: King of the Bootleggers
description: Tonight’s the night we move on notorious bootlegger Rocco Perri and trust me, we need all the help we can get. So, you in or you out?

name: In the Scottish Tower
description: A great peril has befallen the land of Avalon. Embark on a magical quest to defeat the wicked alchemist Markoth once and for all. The fate of this war rests on your shoulders. Our allies overseas need those coordinates and failure is not an option.

name: At the Coachman's Stables
description: Fresh out of the academy you’ve been called on to solve the case of cases: The kidnapping of Detective Murdoch.

location.entrance: through the main entrance on Walmer Road

name: In the Casa Loma tunnels
description: Infiltrate the underground spy facility and discover the source of the signal. But stay on your toes, agent.

location.entrance: Just past the terrace there will be a black door marked as 'AUTHORIZED PERSONS ONLY.' Be sure you are not being followed or observed by enemy spies, dragon egg thieves, or other snoopy characters! Ring the gold and black doorbell, wait a moment, then pull the handle to open the door.

name: Butcher's Basement
description: Had a lot of fun and suspense! It was freaky going in, and the creepy sounds playing over the speaker always kept me on edge. The puzzles were fun/interesting to solve — always looking for codes/number patterns so we could unlock the next room and progress. The creepy props all around always kept me wondering, 'what's a clue, what isn't?' adding to the fun, suspense, and mystery of it all.

name: The Champion of Dragons
description: Had so much fun here! Did the butcher room with myself and one other friend and managed to escape (mind you we needed like 5 hints) but the lady running it was so nice and so helpful! Definitely will be coming back. Great way to spend an afternoon.

name: The Butcher’s Room
description: Did the butcher’s room, the set design was superb! I’ve done a couple escape rooms in different cities and I’m always disoriented on what I can and cannot do and sometimes the exercises can be so convoluted. This one was my favourite by far as it’s straightforward. We almost made it within the hour but this room was more like a 3/5 difficulty if you keep a clear mind despite all the horror.

name: The Butcher's Basement
description: Had a lot of fun and suspense! It was freaky going in, and the creepy sounds playing over the speaker always kept me on edge. The puzzles were fun/interesting to solve — always looking for codes/number patterns so we could unlock the next room and progress. The creepy props all around always kept me wondering, 'what's a clue, what isn't?' adding to the fun, suspense, and mystery of it all. Definitely want to go back and try a another room/theme.

name: Ninja-In-Training
description: All Ninja-In-Training remove their shoes before entering the Dojo. Please bring your own socks or be prepared to play with bare feet. We also provide slippers.

name: Back to the Mummy
description: Difficulty Max 5 Players 60 Minutes Beginner – 50% Success. Embark on a thrilling adventure with ‘Back to the Mummy.’ As amateur tomb raiders, your exploration of The Greatest Sahirah’s Tomb takes a sinister turn when a cursed relic triggers a trap. Now, trapped by Sahirah, you must recover her stolen heart scarab amulet to escape before time runs out. Hurry, unravel the mysteries within 60 minutes to avoid being buried alive. Join us for an immersive escape room experience filled with suspense and ancient secrets.

name: The Butcher's Basement (Horror)
description: Had a lot of fun and suspense! It was freaky going in, and the creepy sounds playing over the speaker always kept me on edge... The creepy props all around always kept me wondering, 'what’s a clue, what isn’t?' adding to the fun, suspense, and mystery of it all.

description: Book now and experience the thrill of becoming a true ninja! Family & Kid Friendly

name: Escape Room Experience

name: Ninja Escape Room Activity
description: You can simply let our staff know when you walk in. We’ll adjust the booking for you. No, electronic devices are not allowed in our rooms. Lockers are provided to store your phones and your belongings before you go in the room.

name: Corporate Event
description: The most fun you could have a team-building event! Play one of our rooms for an exciting teamwork experience with your coworkers.

name: Group Event
description: Have friends or family visiting? Want to try something new with your group? We have the perfect room for any sized group.

name: School Field Trip
description: With a convenient location downtown by Dundas station, our escape rooms are popular for school or club trips. Roundabout provides a fun opportunity for students further develop their interpersonal and transferable skills.

name: Bachelor/Bachelorette Party
description: The key to any bachelor, bachelorette or all-inclusive bach party is being with the people you love. If you're considering a nontraditional soirée, throwing a joint bachelor/bachelorette party at our escape room! What better way to celebrate than escaping together?

name: Corporate Interview ft. Cineplex Directors of Spies in Disguise ( starring Will Smith, Tom Holland) playing The Ninja escape room
description: A unique experience featuring directors of 'Spies in Disguise' and Will Smith & Tom Holland playing the 'The Ninja' escape room.

name: Back To The Mummy Max 5 Players 60 Min Family Friendly

Real Life Room Escape
description: You are trapped. You have one hour, and one mission: Escape! Observe your surroundings, solve clues and make the connection! Uncover the mystery hidden within, find the final key, and escape!

name: The Mystery of the Lost Ship
description: You find yourselves in a mysterious room filled with ancient artifacts. Your mission: solve the puzzles and find the key to escape before time runs out.

name: BELOW THE SPHINX
description: The Great Sphinx of Giza is a mythical creature with the head of a human, a falcon, a cat, or a sheep, and the body of a lion, with the wings of an eagle. It is located right next to the Great Pyramids of Giza and is said to be under the pharaoh’s curse. There have been decades of debate among researchers about the possibility of tunnels and chambers underneath this beast’s paws. The rumors about this great statue became so wild, and debated that there is a hidden library, called the Hall of Records, which holds the answers to the Great Pyramids, the history of mankind, and the only exit. You and your friends are visiting the Sphinx as tourists, and one wrong turn turns into several wrong turns. You have found your way into a dark chamber below the Sphinx. Can you uncover the long-buried secrets of mankind and find the Hall of Records? Or will you become the next victims of the pharaoh’s curse?

name: Cursed Expedition
description: A world famous professor of archeology has been waylaid by locals on a dig in the jungles of Asia. The professor disturbed an ancient temple and brought a curse upon the land. Retrace the professor’s steps to complete the ritual, reverse the curse and escape the temple before time runs out.

name: Room 057
description: In the year 2036, you woke up on a gloomy morning, wondering why you just had that same dream again. In the dream, you were trapped in an abandoned hospital with a blurry visual of a door labeled room #057, on a remote island. You went through a series of mysterious clues before you were finally saved by a rescue team. However, the virus that you picked up from this place had wiped out your memory. Wait, was this a dream or was this part of an actual lost memory of yours 30 years ago? After going through a tremendous amount of psychological struggles, you've decided to recruit your team to follow that blurry memory of yours, to find the way back to the abandoned hospital again in order to dig out the facts behind your long lost memory...

name: The 13th Exit
description: It’s below In a long-forgotten mansion hidden by time, a group stumbles upon an adventure that defies reality. This mysterious abode, crafted by a genius lost to history, is a maze of shifting rooms and enigmatic puzzles. Each chamber presents a piece of a cryptic tale, leading them deeper into the fabric of an unseen world. With time slipping away, they must unravel the secrets that weave through the mansion's heart, where the 13th exit holds the key to their escape.

name: The Dollhouse
description: On the outskirts of town there is an old mansion once owned by a wealthy collector and his family. After the mysterious disappearance of his wife, he shut himself away and he and his daughter were never seen again. Strange sounds coming from the mansion and odd disappearances around town caused rumours to spread that the Collector had a dark secret. Despite the rumours, no one had ever been brave enough to investigate the mansion… until now. Not long after entering, you are quickly subdued by the Collector and left unconscious. After some time, you open your eyes…

name: Lost & Found
description: Fiona and Loey, former lovers, unexpectedly bumped into each other at the theatre, both drawn by the promise of a movie they once vowed to watch together. But this was no ordinary film; it was a journey through their shared past. To reach the end, they need to overcome obstacles and solve intricate puzzles, each challenge a piece of their fractured relationship. As they navigated this labyrinth of memories, they laughed, argued, and slowly began to mend the broken parts of their bond. In the end, they need to realize the truth: 'Love is the greatest puzzle. Together, we are the key.'

name: Scarlet’s Whisper
description: You and your team of seasoned paranormal investigators are called to probe an old mansion, whispered to be haunted by a vengeful spirit. Skepticism hangs in the air as you step inside, but it's quickly shattered by an overwhelming pressure on your chest, making each breath a struggle. The air feels thin, sharp, and hostile. As reality sinks in, the door slams shut behind you, locking you in. The temperature skyrockets, and smoke starts to curl ominously from the corners. Time is slipping away. Your only companions are your team and the chilling unknown that lurks in every shadow.

name: Hotel Dystopia
description: On August 29th, 1938, just before Germany's invasion of Poland ignited WWII, you found yourself at London's enigmatic Hotel Dystopia. As a reporter, you'd heard whispers of secrets hidden within one of the three guest rooms on the third floor, powerful enough to halt the impending war or even something greater. Intrigued by the possibility of altering history, you ventured into the hotel's mysterious corridors, seeking the truth hidden within the rooms.

name: Extraterrestrial Museum
description: You've received an urgent letter from your elusive uncle, Edgar, who runs a top-secret extraterrestrial museum. He needs your help to find and retrieve the mysterious artifacts he's hidden within the museum before they fall into the wrong hands.

name: The Carnival (PG)
description: A spectacular Carnival has arrived in town, and you've all come to see the main attraction: the Fortune Teller. However, upon entering you find yourselves transported into a world of treacherous delights, and mysterious creatures. You are trapped in the Carnival and your only chance of escape is to find the Fortune Teller and have your fate revealed! Will you escape in the time he has given you? Or will you be cursed to wander the Carnival forever?
location: Calgary, Edmonton, Oshawa, Toronto Downtown, Midnight Arcade

name: Midnight Arcade (PG)
description: You wake up in a hospital and the attendant informs you that you have been unconscious for about a week. It was a car accident. Through your delirium, you remember that you are missing something, something extremely important… Where did you leave it? Upon searching your pockets, you find a half-riped note and a metal key. The note shows that you may have been to an arcade facility uptown before the accident… Your missing item could be there! You called the facility, but the guards aren’t much help. It wasn’t until later when you found out there is a shift change at midnight when the entire facility would be empty for an hour. Perfect. You have 60 minutes. Assemble your team and retrieve your item! Good luck.
location: Barrie, Edmonton, Toronto Downtown, Vaughan, Waterloo

name: King Durin's Curse (PG)
description: At his zenith, King Durin, known as 'The King Under the Mountain', ruled his underground Dwarven kingdom with unmatched prowess. His reign, celebrated for years, ended abruptly when a curse plunged the kingdom into darkness, silencing its joyous halls and leaving it overrun by spiders and Orcs. The once-thriving empire, rich with gold, faded into obscurity, becoming a mere legend of lost treasures whispered among townsfolk. No soul dared to challenge the fortress's perilous grip until a daring group of adventurers, lured by tales of hidden riches, decided to venture into the forsaken mines. This courageous team, unaware of the full extent of danger awaiting, embarks on a journey poised to become an epic saga, facing the unknown perils that have claimed the kingdom as their own.

name: Chaos Effect
description: Warning: this is an ultimate science fiction adventure that is no longer just about escaping a room. You and your teammates will need to find out your real purpose after entering the room. This new 70-minute theme is taking your escape game experience to a whole new level of interaction.

name: Jack the Ripper
description: In 1888, 5 women known to work near the Whitechapel District of London were brutally murdered and mutilated. Their killer was never found... Join in on this historical adventure as you discover the identity of the world's most famous serial killer!

name: Happy Nights Inn
description: You wake up trapped in a dark, small room. A stranger's voice speaks out to you in a static voice: “You’re finally awake?... I left some things to keep you occupied while I’m gone... And don’t forget to smile for the camera, they’re watching, so give them a show…”

name: Ancient Pyramid
description: In 1996, a small team of explorers entered the Great Pyramid complex in Giza, Egypt... Could the curse of the pharaoh really exist?... Will you be trapped here forever? Or will you triumph over the curse and make your way to safety?

name: Medieval Prison
description: You are a peasant living in the 14th century wrongly convicted of treason... Will you suffer a painful, undeserving death, or will you break out of this prison?

name: Death Note
description: Criminals around the world are dying of inexplicable heart attacks.

name: The Legend of the House
description: On a stormy night, you and your team have decided to sneak into the house to uncover the mystery within, and to find the missing family member. As you’re walking in, you hear a loud bang. The door won’t budge. The barking is approaching...
location: Ajax Kanata Markham Niagara Falls Mississauga Guelph 7734 Hound Lane (14A)

name: The Noir
description: I always heard stories about my grandfather. About how great of a detective he was, about all the lives lost that he avenged by seeking justice for them. But there was one story that never had an ending: the year was 1947, 4 gangsters were found dead in a dive bar owned by the mob. Grandad was assigned to the case to find the person responsible for this almost admirable crime. He had 4 suspects, each more likely a culprit than the last. I never got a chance to hear the ending to this story, if only I could see things through grandad’s eyes and find the ending myself…
location: Ajax Kanata Newmarket Toronto Downtown Vaughan Windsor The Noir (14A)

name: Secret Inheritance
description: You received a note that your old Aunt Elisa has left you something in her will, but the only thing you were given was a cryptic clue that leads you to her artist's flat. Follow the clues and find the inheritance before your time runs out?

name: TRAPPED
description: The nature of our creative game play requires tremendous amount of teamwork and communication. Which would make us an optimal choice for team building events.

name: Trapped membership program
description: Introducing the Trapped Membership program—designed to reward our loyal customers and elevate their experience at any of our Trapped locations worldwide. Members earn 100 game points after each game, which are then counted toward exciting tiered benefits as follows Silver (0 - 299 points) Enjoy a complimentary beverage at the end of your session. Gold (300 - 799 points) Enjoy a complimentary beverage at the end of your session. Get early access to our newest themes. Platinum (800 - 1499 points) Enjoy a complimentary beverage at the end of your session. Get early access to our newest themes. Free beta testing opportunities unlocked. Diamond (1500+ points) Enjoy a complimentary beverage at the end of your session. Get early access to our newest themes. Free beta testing opportunities unlocked. Receive invitations to exclusive annual events. Join the Trapped Membership today and start enjoying these exclusive perks!

name: Themes
description: Take a peek at our Themes page and choose from the current theme selections, assemble your perfect group, and you're set! Woohoo!

name: TRAPPED Escape Room Activities
description: As the largest escape room chain in Canada, we've grown into a global presence... delivering first-rate entertainment to our customers.
location: Locations across the world including Toronto, Canada

name: TRAPPED Ajax
description: Dive into an extraordinary quest at TRAPPED Ajax, the newest jewel in the revolutionary TRAPPED escape room franchise. Step into a realm where creativity meets challenge, with high-tech games and a distinctive atmosphere dedicated to the thrill of the escape.
location: Conveniently situated near the Ajax Go station and the intersection of Westney and 401

name: Trapped Guelph
description: A premier escape room facility featuring a diverse range of immersive and challenging rooms for enthusiasts of all skill levels. Perfect for corporate team-building events, birthday parties, date nights, and memorable outings with family and friends.

location.accessibility: Easily accessible via major roadways and public transit options. Ample free on-site parking available.

name: TRAPPED Kanata
description: Dive into one of our five meticulously designed escape rooms and put your wits and teamwork to the test as you race against the clock. With just 60 minutes to crack a series of intricate puzzles, your problem-solving skills will be pushed to the limit!

name: Trapped Queen Street
description: Discover the latest addition to the Trapped family in downtown Toronto, a bustling hotspot perfectly situated at Queen and Spadina, just a block away from Nathan Phillips Square. This premier escape room location offers six meticulously crafted games, including a unique 90-minute experience that promises to push your problem-solving skills to the limit. Trapped Queen Street provides an exceptional escape room adventure, ideal for all levels of experience.

name: TRAPPED Niagara Falls escape room
description: Immerse yourself in an exhilarating adventure at TRAPPED Niagara Falls, the latest treasure in the innovative TRAPPED premium escape room franchise. Nestled in the heart of Niagara Falls, our cutting-edge facility invites you to a world of mystery and wonder with immersive experiences like never before!

name: TRAPPED – Newmarket's Premier Escape Room Experience
description: Embark on an exhilarating journey through Newmarket's most immersive and captivating escape games, designed to challenge and enthrall participants of all ages and skill levels. Proudly part of North America's rapidly expanding escape room franchise, Trapped Newmarket delivers an unforgettable, interactive experience that keeps groups coming back for more!

name: exclusive 90-minute premium adventure
description: an exclusive 90-minute premium adventure designed to push your problem-solving skills to the limit.

name: Trapped Vaughan
description: One of the largest real-life room escape games in North America, being one of the fastest growing escape room franchises. The escape room themes at Trapped Vaughan location are appropriate for any level of experience.
location: Vaughan, at the heart of Concord & Woodbridge, near the intersection of Highway 400 and Highway 7. Near Vaughan Mills Mall (5 min drive) and Canada's Wonderland (8 min drive). Easily accessible by car and public transit. Large onsite free parking lot available.

name: The Lab: Lockdown
description: Our Most Popular Theme Loved by players of all levels. Beginner-Friendly Perfect for first-time escape room adventurers. Innovative Puzzles Breaks away from the typical escape room formula. Immersive Experience Dive into a storyline that keeps you fully engaged! Immersive and Realistic Design Every element fits logically into the story, creating a highly believable and engaging experience with multiple endings. Unique and Creative Puzzles Puzzles are logical, and offer multiple solutions, encouraging creativity and teamwork. Physical and Technical Challenges Includes tasks requiring physical coordination and basic programming skills, making it diverse and dynamic.
location: 3478 Lawrence Ave. E. Unit C06, Toronto

name: Bunker: AI's Martyrdom
description: Ultimate Adventure A bold and complete reinvention of traditional escape rooms for a truly immersive experience!

name: Revo Escape - The Research Center
description: A robotic voice echoed through the speakers: “Code red. Code red. All personnel evacuate immediately. The research center will self-destruct in 80 minutes.” This is it. The walls that have imprisoned us are crumbling, both literally and figuratively. For the first time, there’s a way out. A slim chance to escape this nightmare. But there’s no guarantee of survival. If we fail, we’ll die in the explosion. And yet, I’ve made my decision. I’d rather risk everything than rot away in this cell. This is our moment. Our chance to take back control. Freedom—or death.

name: Revo Escape - The Research Center (Basic Version)
description: For those who prefer a shorter challenge, the Basic Version is available in 60 minutes. The objective remains the same: escape before the research center self-destructs.

name: The Tomb: Raiders of the Sword
description: Offers approximately 75% of the full experience, with a more affordable price. Some rooms, challenges and props are omitted, and costumes are not provided.

name: REVO Escape
description: All bookings are private. You will only play with your own group.

name: THE LAB : LOCKDOWN

name: The Mystery of the Haunted Mansion

name: Escape from the Prison Cell
description: Trapped in a prison cell, you must work together to uncover secrets hidden within the room and make your escape before the warden returns.

name: The Secret Lab
description: A mad scientist has locked you in his secret lab. Use your intellect to solve puzzles and find the key to freedom before it's too late.

name: Escape from Alcatraz

name: InBlack Escape
description: The first immersive escape in Canada and themed with Sound effects and visual effects.

name: Micro deduction（act）
description: Realistic scenes, clever mechanisms, and the excitement of our NPCs takes players with a rich sensory experience.

name: The Mystery of the Lost City
description: An ancient city has been hidden for centuries, and it's your mission to discover its secrets. Explore the ruins, solve puzzles, and uncover the mystery before time runs out.

name: Escape from the Haunted Mansion
description: A mysterious presence has trapped you in an abandoned mansion. Use your wits to find hidden clues, decipher riddles, and escape before the spirit returns.

name: The Secret Agent's Dilemma
description: Discover secret messages, crack codes and outsmart enemy agents in this thrilling spy-themed game.

name: The Heist
description: In this exhilarating game, your team of aspiring thieves must crack codes and solve puzzles to pull off the ultimate heist. Can you outsmart the security system and escape within 60 minutes?

name: Escape from the Witch's Cottage
description: You've been captured by a wicked witch! To save yourselves, you must find hidden clues and solve riddles to break her spells. Can you escape within an hour?

name: The Enigma of the Mansion
description: A century-old mystery awaits in this grand mansion. Solve cryptic puzzles and unravel the secrets hidden within its walls to escape before time runs out.

name: The Haunted Mansion
description: Explore a eerie mansion filled with secrets and hidden passageways. Solve puzzles and unravel the mystery behind the mansion's haunting presence in 75 minutes.

name: The Suspense/Suspense/Storyline Activity
description: 2-6 people, $55/person + HST. 60 minutes.

name: Escape No More
description: 60 minutes of fun and adventure awaits as you solve puzzles, find clues, and work together to escape the room. Test your wits and see if you can outsmart the game before time runs out.

name: Nightfall
description: Plunge into a thrilling 60-minute escape experience with Nightfall, where every move counts. Can you unravel the mystery and make it out in time?

name: The Best 60 Minutes of Your Day
description: Gather your team, put away your phones and transport yourself to another world!

name: Captive Kids
description: If you are looking for escape rooms specifically for children and families then you may want to check out Captive Kids.

description: Never give a boring gift again!

location.address: 1120 N. Kings Highway, Myrtle Beach, SC 29577

name: Escape Room Activity (Implicit)
description: My family and I had a blast solving the puzzles of our room!

name: The Blind Tiger
description: You have 60 minutes to find their loot… The story was unbelievable! You had heard the rumours since John Dillinger and his gang were killed, the money from their last bank robbery had never been recovered and was hidden somewhere in Chicago. This was a story that you couldn’t ignore...

name: Lock Up Your Friends!
description: Never give a boring gift again! GIFT CARDS

name: The 13 Doors Escape Room
description: Did the 13 doors escape room! group of 4. we made it out but just in time, about 4 minutes to spare! So a perfect challenge for the hour time slot. Staff was also super fun and friendly and gave a great atmosphere. Will certainly go back for a new room!

name: Captive Escape Rooms Toronto

description: Had an AMAZING time doing this escape room-the perfect balance of challenging and enjoyable. The set dressing was detail oriented and perfectly conveyed the desired atmosphere. Would highly recommend if you’re ever looking for a fun activity and have an hour (or less, if you’re really keen!) to spare.

name: Escape Room: Inheritance
description: As you pull up to the deserted old mansion a feeling of dread begins to overtake you, something isn't right. You should tell the driver to turn around and head back to the airport and never think about this place again but you can't, a part of you has to know why. Why did she choose you? You take a deep breath and get out of the car, as you head toward the massive oak front door it slowly begins to open as though the door itself is inviting you inside. There is no turning back now...

name: Pieces of Eight
description: The sound of the cannons are deafening as you and your mates cower in the darkness of your cells, praying that the next shot doesn’t come crashing through the hull and send you all to a watery grave. How you ended up a prisoner on Blackbeard’s ship being chased by the Spanish Armada in the middle of the Carribbean is another story, one that you might not live to tell. The ship is badly damaged and won’t survive the hour, there must be a way out of these chains and onto the deck, at least there you will stand a chance. You got the crew into this mess and you MUST get them out.

description: The bizarre murders of Charlotte and her little sister at the hands of their seemingly deranged father shocked this close-knit community and still resonates to this day. Now, 20 years later you and your team have returned to the scene of the grisly crime. There has always been something about this crime that just didn’t add up. Why did Gerald Grundy murder his daughters and then kill himself ? What did he do with the bodies? So many questions. Will you find out what really happened in this sinister old house or will you possibly share the Grundy’s fate?

name: Tick Tock !!
description: YOU HAVE 60 MINUTES TO FIND THEIR LOOT… The story was unbelievable! You had heard the rumours since John Dillinger and his gang were killed, the money from their last bank robbery had never been recovered and was hidden somewhere in Chicago. This was a story that you couldn’t ignore, It sounded crazy but the old man made it sound believable. He had been your cell mate for only a few months but he loved to talk. He didn’t know exactly how to retrieve the money, but he knew where to start. That would be enough. He unfortunately would never leave prison alive , but you would. When the day of your release finally arrived it seemed like a dream, the three years had been hard but now you have a purpose.

The last thing you remember was sitting around the cabin laughing and joking with a glass of wine after dinner and then…. Nothing. WAIT, this isn't everyone, Billy and Crystal were at dinner last night but now they’re GONE.

description: The Toronto Stock Exchange faces an unprecedented threat: a massive hack by the elusive 'Red Masks' group. Their goal? Siphon off vast sums of money undetected, putting the entire nation's economy on the line. The clock is ticking as this financial fortress stands on the brink of chaos. YOUR MISSION Selected for an urgent and crucial task, you must connect with '0xsen', a former 'Red Masks' hacker turned pacifist, now concealed in Old Toronto's historic district. In this outdoor escape game, you'll engage in secure communications with 0xsen to halt the cyber attack on the Toronto Stock Exchange. As you earn his trust and join his cause, you'll be challenged to solve intricate puzzles and decipher enigmas that form a web of high-tech intrigue.

Your quick thinking is key to saving the day! In an unexpected turn, the kidnapper has named you to assist the AKP (Anti Kidnapping Police) in solving this high-profile case in Toronto. As part of our outdoor escape game, you'll follow the kidnapper's cryptic instructions to unlock vital clues. Collaborate with Barbara La Chance, the chief detective, and embark on a journey filled with challenging puzzles that will test your problem-solving skills. Delve into the mind of the kidnapper – the tranquility of the Distillery District and the hopes of Toronto's residents depend on your investigative prowess.

name: YES Adventure City Games
description: Voici comment cela fonctionne – en toute simplicité : 1. Choisissez votre mission Tout commence par un scénario. Un mystère à résoudre. Une histoire qui vous embarque. Sélectionnez votre aventure, que vous soyez deux ou dix — nos jeux sont pensés pour tous les groupes, petits ou grands. 2. Composez votre équipe Après votre achat, ajoutez les membres de votre groupe : nom, courriel, langue (français ou anglais). Ils recevront tout ce dont ils ont besoin pour jouer. Envie de pimenter les choses ? Vous pouvez vous répartir en plusieurs équipes pour une compétition amicale . 3. Jouez quand vous voulez Aucune réservation nécessaire. Une fois vos billets en main, vous avez 12 mois pour jouer. Vous pouvez lancer le jeu le jour et l’heure qui vous conviennent. Les équipes peuvent jouer en même temps ou à des moments différents : liberté totale . 4. Rendez-vous au point de départ Le jour J, chaque participant clique sur son lien personnel une fois arrivé au point de départ. Votre téléphone devient votre guide, votre allié, votre portail vers l’inconnu. Résolvez des énigmes, déchiffrez des codes, suivez les indices — en collaboration ou en compétition — avec des indices en option pour ne jamais rester bloqué. 5. Découvrez vos résultats À la fin de l’aventure, découvrez votre score, votre classement, et surtout : qui a gagné le droit de se vanter jusqu’au prochain défi !? 🎁 Offre spéciale pour les groupes Nous offrons 15 % de réduction à partir de 10 joueurs . Pour en profiter, il vous suffit d’entrer le code promotionnel TEAM15 lors du paiement. Prêts à tenter l’aventure ?

name: Exterior Escape Game Adventure
description: In a world where screens dominate every moment of our life, Adventure City Games invites you to get out and embark on an adventure like no other. Our outdoor escape games combine the excitement of a treasure hunt, the challenge of an escape room, and the beauty of a walking tour - all through the most beautiful corners of the city's streets. We call upon all adventurers, those seeking thrill and wonder, to join us in this quest. Leave behind the monotony of everyday life and embrace the unknown.

name: Chaos in Times Square
description: Join a dedicated investigative team on the hunt for a dangerously cunning criminal. Explore the streets of New York City, with its iconic landmarks as your backdrop, as you work to foil the villain's schemes and rescue the city. Immerse yourself fully in this investigation—where every stone has a story to tell!

name: Immerse yourself fully in this investigation—where every stone has a story to tell!
description: Strange occurrences have been unfolding in the city for several days now. The financial hub of Wall Street and the neighborhood of Greenwich Village have both experienced bizarre episodes of collective hysteria, leading to severe consequences and leaving some people teetering between life and death YOUR MISSION Shawna Atkins, a reporter for the Gotham Mirror, and her team are reaching out to you because of your remarkable analytical skills and adaptability. They believe you have the insider knowledge needed to discreetly investigate and safeguard the city and its residents.

name: Secrets in the Financial District
description: Assist a student in uncovering the secret of one of New York City's most famous and iconic landmarks while wandering through the beautiful and historic Financial District. Take in the sights of this emblematic area representing New York and the business world. But be cautious! Speculation won't get you far; you'll need to be concrete and practical to fully enjoy this adventure.

name: The Mystery of Dr. Einstein
description: In this escape room, you'll find yourself in the study of the brilliant but eccentric Dr. Einstein who has gone missing under mysterious circumstances. It's up to your team to crack his codes and solve the puzzles he left behind to reveal what happened to him.

name: Prison Break

name: The Lab

name: Trouvez Justine à Ottawa
description: L’heure est grave. Un astéroïde fonce tout droit sur la terre menaçant l’humanité toute entière. La fiction est devenue réalité et cette fois Bruce Willis ne sera pas notre héros. Ces dernières années, les ingénieurs de la NASA (National Asteroid Service d’Alberta) ont étudié différents moyens pour éviter un tel drame. Ils vont tenter de dévier la trajectoire de l'astéroïde au moyen d’une explosion nucléaire. Le Canada étant dans le top 3 des pays producteurs d’Uranium, la NASA veut obtenir l'accord de la division des affaires secrètes du Canada pour utiliser cette ressource et lancer la bombe. Mais où est Justine Bompardi? Aperçue il y a quelques jours dans les rues d’Ottawa, il va falloir la trouver et l’informer au plus vite. VOTRE MISSION Vous avez été sélectionné.e par la NASA (National Asteroid Service d’Alberta) pour cette mission top secrète. Vous serez guidé-e par Olivia, votre agente de liaison. Vous devrez trouver Justine Bompardi qui a été aperçue il y a quelques jours à la galerie Nationale du Canada et l’informer de la terrible nouvelle. Surtout, vous devrez agir en toute discrétion pour ne pas ébruiter la nouvelle et semer la panique générale. C’est pour cette raison que vous avez été recruté-e. L’avenir de l’humanité est entre vos mains et le temps est compté!

name: Mystérieuses Tulipes à Ottawa
description: De mystérieuses disparitions secouent la ville d’Ottawa. Cette investigation vous amènera à découvrir un nouveau visage de la ville. Soyez attentif, chaque détail a son importance dans cette enquête.

name: Ottawa Escape Game
description: Une série de disparitions sévit dans la ville d’Ottawa. Plusieurs personnes manquent déjà à l’appel. Un seul indice pour le moment: une tulipe en pot a été retrouvée sur chaque lieu présumé de l’enlèvement. La population a peur et la police est à cran, l’enquête patauge et personne ne parle. Qui se cache derrière tout ça? Qu’est ce qui relie les disparus? Et surtout où sont-ils? Autant de questions en suspens auxquelles il va falloir répondre pour que la ville retrouve un peu de tranquillité.

Our adventures are available in both English and French.

name: Mission in Quebec City
description:
Québec City citizens are acting strangely, very strangely. Some are taking a zucchini for a walk instead of their dog, some are wearing winter clothes in summer, and others are driving through red lights. Some are even walking on their hands! We need to quickly find out what's going on in the city!

Your Mission:
You've been hired by Quebec City's very secret service. Throughout this mission, you'll be guided by Pierre-Luc, your fellow agent and vital advisor. Equipped with your courage and good walking shoes, you'll make your way through Old Québec in search of clues to help you figure out who is behind this chaos. Scrutiny will be required!

description: You're locked in a bank vault and must solve puzzles to escape before time's up. It's a thrilling race against the clock!

name: Ottawa Kidnappings
description:
A series of missing people are plaguing the city of Ottawa. Several people have already gone missing. So far, there is only one clue: a potted tulip found at each of the suspected abduction sites. The public is scared and the police are on edge, the investigation is stalled and no one is talking. Who is behind this? What connects the missing people? And most importantly, where are they? All of these unanswered questions must be answered if the city is to regain a little peace and order.

YOUR MISSION Inspector Hakim Forge is asking you to be his eyes and ears in the field. Solve the puzzles and help Hakim link the different clues together. The public is scared, it's time for the panic to stop. Ottawa is counting on you!

description: Plus on est, plus c'est fun ! Que ce soit entre amis, en famille ou entre collègues, Adventure City Games s'adapte à toutes les tailles de groupe. Vous pouvez former des équipes et même pimenter l’expérience avec une compétition amicale contre la montre. Prêts à relever le défi ? Non, c'est l'un de nos grands avantages ! Après l'achat d'un jeu, vous avez 12 mois pour démarrer votre aventure à tout moment, sans réservation. Jouez le jour qui vous convient, à l'heure de votre choix. Nous recommandons cependant de jouer avant la tombée de la nuit, car certaines énigmes nécessitent de lire des panneaux ou d'observer des détails sur les bâtiments. Un jeu dure généralement entre 1 et 2 heures, selon votre progression. Chaque énigme est chronométrée, avec un délai de 30 minutes pour la plupart des défis, ajoutant une touche d'excitation supplémentaire !

A wealthy industrialist, Eldridge, has disappeared without a trace from his grand mansion, leaving behind only clues and riddles. Your mission is to solve the mystery of his disappearance within 60 minutes.

name: La série de disparitions à Ottawa
description: Une série de disparitions sévit dans la ville d’Ottawa. Plusieurs personnes manquent déjà à l’appel. Un seul indice pour le moment: une tulipe en pot a été retrouvée sur chaque lieu présumé de l’enlèvement. La population a peur et la police est à cran, l’enquête patauge et personne ne parle. Qui se cache derrière tout ça? Qu’est ce qui relie les disparus? Et surtout où sont-ils? Autant de questions en suspens auxquelles il va falloir répondre pour que la ville retrouve un peu de tranquillité.

name: Rocco Perri's Joint
description: One-of-a-kind experience for you, gotta be some kind of brave not to accept an invite to Rocco Perri's joint. Rocco, the so called King of the Bootleggers, has been runnin' this town ever since the G-men banned the good stuff back in '16. His bootlegging biz is almost as legendary as his wild parties. I'll give it to ya straight, no chaser, come find me at Casa Loma and I'll give you the grand tour. Just be on the lookout for the speakeasy door. There's something we gotta talk about. Trust me, you won't wanna miss it.

name: The Experience
description: This experience far exceeded my expectations and I would wholeheartedly do it again and recommend it to all my friends! Thoroughly enjoyed the experience and will be back to try a new one! The venue, actors, theme was exceptional! Best Escape Room we've ever done! I love escape rooms and experiences, and this one did not disappoint We're all experienced players and it was the BEST any of us have ever done! The actors did an amazing job, and their banter was as a highlight of the room. I enjoyed having multiple actors in the room and would enjoy another room with multiple characters to interact with. The actors were fantastic the entire time. Wow! Really well thought-through escape game with attention to historic details and super immersive.

name: In Rocco Perri's Empire
description: In 1920’s Toronto, prohibition is at its peak and at the top of the bootlegging empire sits notorious gangster, Rocco Perri. But if you've got the brains the guts for it, all that could change, and someone new could take the throne.In the sordid world of swingin’ speakeasies, everyone’s out for a piece of the pie. You receive an invitation to a secret meeting at Rocco’s infamous bar. Some of these cats you play with might be your pals, and some might be mugs you ain't never met before.

location.instructions: Meet your crew at 1 Austin Terrace, Toronto, M5R 1X8. Ring the gold and black doorbell, wait a moment, then pull the handle to open the door.

name: Station M
description: This challenge includes Patriots and code crackers: an intruder has breached the tunnels... Station M was the cloak-and-dagger handle given to the covert intel hub concealed beneath the towers and ballrooms of Casa Loma. After the Big War, the facility was mothballed and left to slumber in the subterranean tunnels — until now. Against all logic, a Soviet mole posing as one of our agents has been discovered in Station M. Your mission: assist the operative in navigating the shadowy depths of Station M and find what information has been leaked.

name: Murdoch Mysteries Theatrical Escape Room
description: You may partake in this adventure for a fee of Choose your comrades wisely, we allow You must find Detective Murdoch within The experience is rated Be warned, the station house has Constables: assist us in locating Detective Murdoch! Listen up! The greatest detective in all of Canada has gone missing, and 'tis up to us to find him! As the newest constables on the force in Toronto in 1905, we must make locating William Murdoch our number one priority. We have all the resources of Station House No. 4 at our fingertips, but 'twill take more than brute strength to save Murdoch. It will take wit, intelligence, and unrelenting determination. Are ye with me? Fear not, for this experience shall not send shivers down your spine. Nor shall it, hopefully, terrify our dear Detective Murdoch wherever he may be. Live actors shall be in attendance, but they shall not lay a hand on you, and we ask the same courtesy in return. Let the sets and costumes whisk you away to Toronto in the late 1800s. Relax, and let us take you on a journey. This experience grants you exclusive access to some buildings on the Casa Loma grounds not open to the general public. Do you have the daring and courage to partake in this exclusive adventure?

name: The Lost Treasure of Captain Blackheart
description: You're a crew aboard the infamous pirate ship, The Serpent's Revenge. Captain Blackheart has hidden his treasure somewhere on board and it's your mission to find it before time runs out.

name: The Labyrinth of Dr. Paradox
description: Dr. Paradox has created a labyrinthine lair filled with riddles, traps, and mind-bending puzzles. Can you navigate his maze and defeat him before it's too late?

name: The Haunting of Hill House
description: You've been called to investigate strange occurrences in the infamous Hill House. Explore the eerie mansion, unravel its dark past, and confront the terrifying entities that reside within.

name: The Time Travel Paradox
description: A malfunctioning time machine has sent you back to a pivotal moment in history. To return to your own time, you must correct the timeline by solving period-specific puzzles and avoiding altering the past.

name: Time Travel Paradox

name: The Mystery of the Haunted Cabin
description: You and your team find yourselves in a eerie cabin, surrounded by the chilling whispers of the woods. A ghostly figure appears, pleading for help to free them from an ancient curse. Your only hope is to decipher cryptic messages and uncover hidden secrets within the hour.

name: Prison Break: Escape Alcatraz
description: You're a prisoner on Alcatraz Island in the 1930s, and your only chance of escape is to solve the warden's riddles and outsmart the guards. This immersive experience combines physical puzzles with strategic planning, testing your team's wits against one of history's most notorious prisons.

name: Escape the Lost Temple
description: Deep in the jungle, you've stumbled upon an ancient temple filled with treasure and danger. To escape the temple's curse, you'll need to solve its many puzzles and unlock its hidden secrets before time runs out.

name: The Haunted Asylum: Escape the Mad Doctor
description: Dr. Schmidt, a mad scientist, has locked you in his asylum for experiments. You must find your way out by solving puzzles and escaping before he returns to claim another victim.

name: VRCADE
description: We’re more than just a VR arcade—we’re a community hub where friends, families, and newcomers alike can bond, explore, and create memories through cutting-edge VR games that encourage movement, teamwork, and joy.

name: Escape Room Activities
description: At VRCADE, our mission is to bring people together through immersive virtual reality experiences that spark fun, connection, and adventure.

name: VR Experiences at VRCADE
description: Each of our VR experiences is designed to offer something unique, from exciting solo missions to cooperative challenges, all while promoting a bit of fitness along the way. We believe that VR has the power to bring people closer, create lasting connections, and inspire a sense of wonder that stays with you long after the headset comes off.

description: A local legend speaks of a mysterious treasure hidden deep within the ancient walls of St. Mary’s Church, waiting to be discovered by those brave enough to unlock its secrets.

name: The Mystery of the Vanishing Act
description: A renowned magician has disappeared without a trace, leaving behind only an empty stage and a cryptic message. It's up to you to unravel the magic and find out what happened.

name: Meteor Defense Platform Tiberia Repair
description: Repair the Meteor Defense Platform Tiberia to put an end to this catastrophic event before it's too late. This virtual escape room experience tests players' ability to solve problems together with accelerating stakes and action while the clock ticks down to disaster.

name: Repair the Meteor Defense Platform Tiberia
description: This virtual escape room experience tests players' ability to solve problems together with accelerating stakes and action while the clock ticks down to disaster.

name: Time Travel Terrors
description: Something's gone wrong with your time machine! You and your team are stuck in a time loop, reliving the same hour over and over again. To break the cycle, you must figure out what went wrong and fix it before time runs out.

name: Pirates Plague Escape Room Activity
description: You and your pirate crew have fallen victim to a curse and transformed into fishmen! The only cure is locked deep within an island temple — but time is running out.

name: Our most ambitious VR game yet

name: Manor of Escape
description: Packed with puzzle-solving and exhilarating action only possible in virtual reality, Manor of Escape pushes the limits of immersive, thrilling, horror-themed escape experiences.

name: Escape Malin's Manor
description: The mad count Malin has been running evil experiments with dangerous creatures in his creepy manor. Solve puzzles and escape before it's too late!

name: Escape The Mad Count Malin
description: The mad count Malin has been running evil experiments with dangerous creatures in his creepy manor. Can you and your team of 2-6 players solve the puzzles, find the clues, and make it out alive?

name: Escape Room: The Mystery of Dr. Grave
description: Solve puzzles, find clues and escape the mad doctor's lab in this thrilling escape room adventure.

name: Mission: Impossible - The Escape Room Experience
description: Work as a team to outsmart an evil organization and prevent a global disaster in this high-stakes, action-packed escape room.

name: Cursed Manor: A Haunted Escape Room Adventure
description: Investigate an ancient curse and break it before time runs out in this terrifying, immersive escape room experience.

name: Cops vs Robbers
description: Dive into thrilling VR heists where you can choose to be a policeman or a robber in an intense bank robbery scenario! Test your skills and strategy as you defend yourself or outwit the opposing team in heart-pounding PvP action.

name: Adventure Mode
description: Not into head-to-head combat? Try the adventure mode , where you play as a detective hot on the trail of cunning thieves. Navigate through tricky traps and challenging puzzles to uncover the truth and save the day. The excitement never stops in this immersive, high-stakes VR experience!

name: Heist
description: Dive into Cops vs Robbers: The Heist , an intense PvE experience where you and your team of elite officers must track down a notorious bank robber in virtual reality. Strategize, coordinate, and work together to chase the thief through dynamic city environments, overcoming obstacles, traps, and AI-controlled enemies. As the robber executes their perfect getaway, your mission is to stop them before they disappear with the loot. With high-stakes chases, immersive VR action, and heart-pounding moments of suspense, Heist brings cooperative gameplay to the next level in this adrenaline-charged pursuit!

name: Team Deathmatch
description: Experience Cops vs Robbers in a thrilling team deathmatch format, where cooperation is the key to domination! In this intense PvP VR experience, players are divided into two teams—cops and robbers—each with unique abilities and objectives. Work together with your teammates to outmaneuver the opposing side, whether you’re a robber planning the perfect heist or a cop hunting down criminals. With strategic coordination, powerful weapons, and immersive environments, every battle is a high-stakes showdown. Victory is only achieved through teamwork, precision, and fast reflexes in this adrenaline-fueled virtual reality combat!

name: Free for all
description: Step into Cops vs Robbers , an exhilarating free-for-all PvP experience in virtual reality! Choose your side—cunning robbers or law-enforcing cops—and dive into chaotic, high-speed battles where every player is your enemy. As a robber, outsmart your foes with stealth and strategy, stealing loot and escaping before getting caught. As a cop, uphold justice by tracking down criminals and ensuring no one escapes.

name: VR Escape Room
description: Immerse yourself in a virtual reality escape room adventure. Solve puzzles and escape within 60 minutes.

name: After The Fall
description: In the 1980s, a new ice age nearly wiped out humanity.

name: Brave the frozen wasteland for supplies
description: Explore an icy, post-apocalyptic LA, wield deadly weapons and 80s-inspired tech, and fight through hordes of snowbreed in intense, real-life movement combat. Team up with players worldwide to take on towering bosses and reclaim the city.

name: Explore an icy, post-apocalyptic LA
description: Now, 20 years later, survivors live underground, relying on Harvest Runners like you to brave the frozen wasteland for supplies. Explore an icy, post-apocalyptic LA, wield deadly weapons and 80s-inspired tech, and fight through hordes of snowbreed in intense, real-life movement combat.

name: Ghost Patrol
description: Step inside a videogame together with your friends and family and experience the spooky adventure of a lifetime me.

name: Color Ghosts Activity
description: Ghosts have invaded a strange manor where hallways move and even the furniture has come to life. Armed with your Hue Blasters, your squad will soon be zipping and zapping away at the colorful visitors.

name: Color Ghost Hunt
description: Ghosts have invaded a strange manor where hallways move and even the furniture has come to life. Armed with your Hue Blasters, your squad will soon be zipping and zapping away at the colorful visitors.

name: Mystery at the Manor
description: Unravel the mystery behind an ancient manor's ghostly occurrences in this spine-tingling escape room adventure.

name: The Smurfs: Blueberry Blast
description: In this Smurfs VR game, step into the vibrant Smurf Village and defend it from enemies like Gargamel and his minions using a trusty slingshot.

name: immersive, action-packed gameplay
description: Experience immersive, action-packed gameplay as you aim, fire, and dodge attacks in a fully interactive world.

name: The Secret Laboratory
description: Dr. E has gone mad and locked everyone in his secret laboratory! Solve puzzles to escape before Dr. E returns.

name: Arizona Sunshine
description: Join forces with up to 4 players and take on the brain-hungry undead as they lurch out of the surrounding canyons to attack you, wave after wave.

name: Party Playland
description: In this family-friendly party game experience, you and your friends will compete to become the latest and greatest Party Champion.

name: Arcade Mode
description: Take part in colorful mini-games from the world of party playland! This party game is perfect for children’s groups, birthday parties and people who want to compete in a fun way. In arcade mode, players compete in a mini-game of their choice, selected in advance.

name: Fiesta Mode
description: The fiesta mode offers a randomized gaming experience, with players not knowing the challenges they’ll face in advance, but discovering them as they go along!

name: Fiesta Sandbox
description: This game mode allows players to choose their mini-game directly in the session, with a dedicated selection lobby. Rather practical for long sessions where players can choose their own course.

name: Space Academy
description: Explore the farthest reaches of space with your crew in Space Academy.

name: Interactive Solar System Activity
description: Learn more about the different planets in our solar system and answer interactive quizzes to score the most points! Let yourself be carried away and open your eyes wide to this spectacle.

name: The Secret Agent's Mission
description: You are a secret agent on a mission to defuse a bomb in an enemy's hideout. You have only 60 minutes before the bomb explodes.

name: RUSH Z
description: If you’ve ever dreamed of being part of a zombie apocalypse to shoot tons of them, this survival mode is made for you! Resist as much as you can in RUSH Z because these hordes of creatures won’t spare you! Bring your guns and hold on because you won’t be able to rest for a while.

name: Virtual Reality Arcade
description: Immerse yourself in our state-of-the-art virtual reality experiences. With a variety of games and simulations, we offer something for everyone.

name: Cyberclash
description: Grab your blasters, shoot your opponents and climb the ranks in this competitive shooter.

name: Deathmatch
description: Battle against your opponents, rise through the ranks, and become the champion of the arena. In this game, it’s everyone for themselves, explore the map and always have an eye on your back if you want to stay at the top of the leaderboard.

name: Archery
description: Ditch your blasters to equip your bow and arrows ! Look around, find your target and aim to assert your dominance on the arena. This tactical game mode will put your aim and skills to the test. You better be quick if you want to become the champion of the arena.

name: King of the Hill
description: Choose your skin, form a team, and capture objectives around the map. The longer you hold an objective the more points you’ll accumulate. Choose between bows or blasters and be the better team at the end of the allotted time. Communication and aiming skills will be your two biggest allies if you want to immerge victorious!

name: Battle Royale
description: The storm is closing in on you. Stay inside the eye of the storm if you want to stay alive ! Be careful because in this game mode it’s everyone for themselves. May the best win! Be the last one standing to win rounds.

name: Pixel Hack
description: A multiplayer cooperative shooting game that combines elements of shooting, cooperation, bullet hell, dodging, and music.

Inside are three trapped souls awaiting their release! You have 1 hour to rescue them. If you don’t succeed then you will be trapped with them forever in the haunted cavern that is – The Grand Wilshire Hotel!

name: Escape The Village On May 2
description: You will have a whole medium level challenge wheelchair accessible A hushed whisper beckons you closer to hear their plea… “Greetings, stranger. You may notice something… odd about this place. Lately, the people of the Village at Black Creek have been possessed by something vile in nature. I fear a terrible evil has set root here. Please stranger, you are only a visitor to this place but… Will you help me unravel this dark plot?”

name: Where Dark Things Dwell (Outdoor)
description: THIS WAS A VERY COOL OUTDOOR ESCAPE ROOM EXPERIENCE! The historic setting, the actors, the dark, the puzzles - everything was so good. The level of the puzzles was perfect. ...Even though we didn’t finish, we enjoyed the process and the puzzles! I like that the non-actors checked up on us and were so nice. Lots of interactions with the masked villagers.

The fate of this war rests on your shoulders. Our allies overseas need those coordinates and failure is not an option. Move out! Tonight’s the night we move on notorious bootlegger Rocco Perri and trust me, we need all the help we can get. So, you in or you out?

name: In Rocco's Bar
description: In 1920’s Toronto, prohibition is at its peak and at the top of the bootlegging empire sits notorious gangster, Rocco Perri. But if you've got the brains the guts for it, all that could change, and someone new could take the throne.In the sordid world of swingin’ speakeasies, everyone’s out for a piece of the pie. You receive an invitation to a secret meeting at Rocco’s infamous bar. Some of these cats you play with might be your pals, and some might be mugs you ain't never met before.
location: Meet your crew at 1 Austin Terrace, Toronto, M5R 1X8. Walk towards the terrace on the East side of the building (if you're facing the main doors of Casa Loma, it will be around to your left). Ring the gold and black doorbell, wait a moment, then pull the handle to open the door.

name: Dragon's Song Quest
description: You have been asked to embark upon a dangerous quest: to save dragons from extinction. Casa Loma’s tower becomes a portal to another world of wizards and magic, where the last dragon egg is rumoured to rest. Will you find the egg and learn the secret of the dragon’s song? Those who you will encounter upon this quest may be your closest confidants or may be unfamiliar faces.

name: A Secret City adventure, in partnership with… not-so-secret society
description: Meet your team at 1 Austin Terrace, Toronto, M5R 1X8. Walk towards the terrace on the East side of the building (if you're facing the main doors of Casa Loma, it will be around to your left). Beware of vines and crocodile filled moats as you approach. Just past the terrace there will be a black door marked as "AUTHORIZED PERSONS ONLY". Ring the gold and black doorbell, wait a moment, then pull the handle to open the door. We have secure storage at the game for your belongings. There are washrooms that can be accessed before and after the game. Six flights of stairs must be conquered in order to reach the mission, and then 3 spiral staircases in the game.

name: Murdoch Mysteries Escape Room
description: You must find Detective Murdoch within The experience is rated Be warned, the station house has Constables: assist us in locating Detective Murdoch! Listen up! The greatest detective in all of Canada has gone missing, and 'tis up to us to find him! As the newest constables on the force in Toronto in 1905, we must make locating William Murdoch our number one priority. We have all the resources of Station House No. 4 at our fingertips, but 'twill take more than brute strength to save Murdoch. It will take wit, intelligence, and unrelenting determination. Are ye with me? Fear not, for this experience shall not send shivers down your spine. Nor shall it, hopefully, terrify our dear Detective Murdoch wherever he may be. Live actors shall be in attendance, but they shall not lay a hand on you, and we ask the same courtesy in return. Let the sets and costumes whisk you away to Toronto in the late 1800s. Relax, and let us take you on a journey. This experience grants you exclusive access to some buildings on the Casa Loma grounds not open to the general public. Do you have the daring and courage to partake in this exclusive adventure?

name: The Anti-Submarine Detection Research Centre Mission
description: Attention all personnel, listen up! The Anti-Submarine Detection Research Centre has detected an advance of those dastardly U-boats and submarines on our base. We need your assistance in finding their precise locations to alert the allies. Rendezvous at the undercover lab to get started.
duration: The mission is rated at 60 minutes

description: My Experience What Is Your Refund Policy? As this is a live event, all sales are final and we are not able to issue refunds. However, Pirate Life is committed to providing excellent experiences to all of our patrons so if you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us.

name: Sailing Adventure
description: There are no playing sections indoors or below decks, so we always recommend bringing an extra warm layer as the temperature tends to be cooler on the water! Do You Sail In The Rain? So long as conditions are safe we will sail rain or shine! Please dress appropriately for the weather. In cases of inclement weather (i.e. storms) we may postpone the game. You will be notified in advance whenever possible.

description: You are wrongfully accused and sentenced to prison. Your only hope of escape is to work together with your team to find hidden clues, solve riddles, and break out before time runs out.

name: The Lab: Chemical Experiments Gone Wrong
description: A mad scientist's chemical experiments have gone awry, and the lab is now filled with deadly gases. Your team must work together to solve puzzles and escape before you run out of breathable air.

name: Haunted Mansion: The Curse of the Phantom
description: A century-old curse haunts a grand mansion, and its phantom demands that intruders complete a series of challenges to lift the enchantment. Work with your team to solve riddles and escape before the ghost claims you as its own.

name: The Haunted Mansion Escape Room
description: In this spine-tingling escape room, you'll enter a haunted mansion filled with secrets and scares. Can your team solve the puzzles and break the curse before time runs out?

name: Escape Room: The Mystery of the Lost Diamond
description: You and your team are detectives on a mission to solve the mystery behind a priceless diamond that has been stolen. You have 60 minutes to find clues, decipher puzzles, and unravel the story before the thief returns. Can you crack the case in time?

name: Escape Room: The Zombie Apocalypse
description: The world has been taken over by zombies, and your team is locked inside a room. You have one hour to figure out how to escape before the zombies break in. Work together to solve puzzles, find keys, and unlock doors to make it out alive.

name: Escape Room: The Secret Laboratory
description: Your team is a group of scientists who have been conducting secret experiments in an underground laboratory. Something has gone wrong, and now you're trapped inside with no way out. You must solve puzzles related to chemistry, biology, and physics to escape before time runs out.

name: Escape Room: The Haunted Mansion
location: An old mansion on the outskirts of town
description: A century-old curse has trapped your team's ancestors in an eternal loop, reliving their final moments inside an old mansion. You have one hour to explore the house, solve puzzles, and break the curse before it's too late.

name: Haunted Asylum: 13 Doors
description: A thrilling escape room adventure that takes you through a haunted asylum with 13 locked doors. You have 90 minutes to find the keys and solve puzzles.

name: Cursed: The Lost Treasure
description: An ancient treasure is cursed, and you must solve puzzles within 90 minutes to lift the curse before it's too late. This escape room has a maximum capacity of 12 players.

name: The Escape Artist
description: You're the world's greatest illusionist, and your rival has challenged you to create the ultimate escape room. Can you outwit your rival and their deadly traps in just 60 minutes?

name: The Time Machine
description: Dr. Emmett Brown needs your help! Invent a time machine, find the flux capacitor, and escape before the temporal field collapses in this 80-minute escape room adventure.

name: Escape Room: The Secret of the Old Mansion
description: You've been invited to explore the mysterious old mansion on the hill, known for its hidden secrets and strange occurrences. Your mission is to solve a series of puzzles within 60 minutes to uncover the truth behind the legend.

name: Time Travelers
description: Embark on a thrilling journey through time, visiting different eras and solving era-specific puzzles to fix a temporal paradox.

name: The Heist: Bank Job
